name: L.E.S.K.I.V
description:
L.E.S.K.I.V is a Bullet Hell Arena where you haven't a gun. The only thing you can do is dodging the bullets which come at you. While you survive, you get point. The nearest of the center you are, the more you get score. However, the more you rest, the more the zone become hard. What will you choose ? The score or the life ?

CREDITS :

Game made by MisterOcelot

Music : The Lift - Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)
